desc: The Rail-EZ is the simple and elegant solution to non- permanently attach a patio umbrella to your railing. The Rail-EZ Patio umbrella mounting Bracket, is a great alternative to heavy, bulky patio umbrella stands! Put your patio, deck or balcony railings to work Email: Csmanager@rail-ez.com Phone: 765-766-4536

layout.text: EZ Instant shade where and when you need it!
